roleset.name: to grieve or protest loudly, to cry
roleset.note: WAIL-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls manner_speaking-37.3, animal_sounds-38, sound_emission-43.2. (from wail.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: At the hearing , Rep. Oakar started wailing about `` phoney baloney regulations '' that [*T*-1] would stand between her and `` housing for downtown Cleveland . ''
example.arg: about `` phoney baloney regulations '' that [*T*-1] would stand between her and `` housing for downtown Cleveland
